Spirit Helmet

helmet (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 185
armor id [armor]: 79 (Spirit Helmet)
protection, head [prothead]: 20
auto spell [autocombatspell]: #511 Lightning Bolt

Requires 15A to forge (A3)

An Air spirit is trapped within the gem placed on the front of this helmet. The Air spirit will throw lightning bolts at any enemy that comes within sight. The Air spirit does this independently of its owner's activities.
